title: How to calculate the BSR of any best selling books on Amazon kdp
description:
To learn how to model a book that is selling well. Books with lower BSR are advisable to model. Don't be tempted to copy words for words.

Please ensure to watch the whole Playlist for proper understanding.

https://youtu.be/7kNlYegaBFg - this wíll show you what to consider to model a hot selling book.
